allow: Bash(for repo in dreamerv3 ijepa LLaVA LumenPallidium-jepa mae SEAL Sealing swav vicreg vit-pytorch vjepa2 Voyager)
Bash(for repo in dreamerv3 ijepa LLaVA LumenPallidium-jepa mae Sealing swav vicreg vit-pytorch vjepa2 Voyager)

Bash(# Create ADRs directory if it doesn't exist
mkdir -p /Users/jean-patricksmith/lev/workshop/adrs

# Move ADRs
echo "Moving ADRs..."
cp -r /Users/jean-patricksmith/digital/homie/tmp/workshop-archive/adrs/* /Users/jean-patricksmith/lev/workshop/adrs/

# Move key data files to workshop root
echo "Moving tracking CSV..."
cp /Users/jean-patricksmith/digital/homie/tmp/workshop-archive/data/WORKSHOP_TRACKING_FINAL.csv /Users/jean-patricksmith/lev/workshop/

# Move synthesis docs to workshop/docs
echo "Moving synthesis documentation..."
mkdir -p /Users/jean-patricksmith/lev/workshop/docs/june-2025-intake
cp -r /Users/jean-patricksmith/digital/homie/tmp/workshop-archive/docs/* /Users/jean-patricksmith/lev/workshop/docs/june-2025-intake/

echo "Documentation moved successfully")

Bash(# Check which repos we moved that aren't in the CSV
for repo in dreamerv3 ijepa LLaVA LumenPallidium-jepa mae Sealing swav vicreg vit-pytorch vjepa2 Voyager; do
    if ! grep -q "^$repo," /Users/jean-patricksmith/lev/workshop/WORKSHOP_TRACKING_FINAL.csv; then
        echo "Missing from CSV: $repo"
    fi
done)

Bash(# Check which repos we moved that aren't in the CSV
for repo in dreamerv3 ijepa LLaVA LumenPallidium-jepa mae Sealing swav vicreg vit-pytorch vjepa2 Voyager; do
    grep -q "^$repo," /Users/jean-patricksmith/lev/workshop/WORKSHOP_TRACKING_FINAL.csv || echo "Missing from CSV: $repo"
done)

Bash(# Verify all repos were moved successfully
echo "Checking archive repos directory:"
ls -la /Users/jean-patricksmith/digital/homie/tmp/workshop-archive/repos/

echo -e "\nChecking workshop intake for moved repos:"
for repo in dreamerv3 ijepa LLaVA LumenPallidium-jepa mae Sealing swav vicreg vit-pytorch vjepa2 Voyager; do
    if [ -d "/Users/jean-patricksmith/lev/workshop/intake/$repo" ]; then
        echo "✅ $repo successfully moved"
    else
        echo "❌ $repo MISSING"
    fi
done)
